Package game.rune

Class RuneManager

java.lang.Object
game.rune.RuneManager
public class RuneManager
extends java.lang.Object
A rune manager to manage the calculation of the rune including how many rune from enemy drop will be transferred to the player or selling weapons will increase the player runes etc.
